import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import Logo from "../assets/logo.png" export const Headers = () => { const [theme, setTheme] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("theme")) || "dark") useEffect(() => { localStorage.setItem(JSON.stringify("theme"), theme) document.documentElement.removeAttribute("class") document.documentElement.classList.add(theme) }, [theme]) return (
